JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type == "user"
| set 
	GROUP = extract(ENTITY, "(.*):users.*", 0)
	STATUS =  extract(ENTITY, ".*:users(.*)", 0)
| filter
	STATUS == "Active"
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, GROUP]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by= [GROUP]
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type=area
	pointradius=2
	settings = tojson(param("chart_settings", {}))

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE]
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| chart 
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=[MIN,AVG,"P95",MAX]
	type=area
	pointradius=2
	settings = tojson(param("chart_settings", {}))

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user" 
	
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, type]
	COUNT=SUM(COUNT)
| chart 
	by= [type]
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type=area
	pointradius=2
	settings = tojson(param("chart_settings", {}))

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type == "user"
| set 
	GROUP = extract(ENTITY, "(.*):users.*", 0)
	STATUS =  extract(ENTITY, ".*:users(.*)", 0)
| filter
	STATUS == "Waiting"
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, GROUP]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by= [GROUP]
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type="steppedarea" 
	stacked=false
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type == "user"
| set 
	GROUP = extract(ENTITY, "(.*):users.*", 0)
	STATUS =  extract(ENTITY, ".*:users(.*)", 0)
| filter
	STATUS == "Waiting"
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, GROUP]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by= [GROUP]
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type="steppedarea" 
	stacked=false
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = request
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, request] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (type == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (type == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[request] 
	OK_COUNT = sum(OK_COUNT)
	KO_COUNT = sumif(KO_COUNT)
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
	"counts" = records()
	"metrics" = records()
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fields(request, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	
	AVG=['decimals', 1]
	
| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["OK_COUNT", "KO_COUNT"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=globals("sparktype") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=1 
	stacked=true
| formatchart 
	fields=["metrics"] 
	by=[]
	y=["MIN", "AVG", "P95", "MAX"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=globals("sparktype") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=1

| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=10

widgets.TITLE: Statistics As CSV (Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = request
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[request] 
	OK_COUNT = sum(OK_COUNT)
	KO_COUNT = sumif(KO_COUNT)
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| display as=csv menu=false

	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case(

widgets.TITLE: Statistics As XML(Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = request
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[request] 
	OK_COUNT = sum(OK_COUNT)
	KO_COUNT = sumif(KO_COUNT)
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| display as=xml menu=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = request

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[request] 
	"FROM"	=min(TIME)
	"TO"	=max(TIME)
| chart 
	by=[request] 
	type='gantt'
	x=FROM # start time in epoch milliseconds
	y=TO   # end time in epoch milliseconds
	showaxes=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| meta name="data"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "user"
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
;
#####################################
# MIN
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "MIN"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "MIN" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# AVG
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "AVG"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "AVG" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# P95
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "P95"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "P95" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# MAX
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "MAX"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "MAX" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;


#####################################
# Join
| meta name = "INDEX"
| source empty records = 100
| set PERC = count() + 1
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right" # join MIN
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join AVG
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join P95
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join MAX
| resultremove "data"
| rename PERC = Percentile
| chart 
	y=["MIN", "AVG", "P95", "MAX"]	
	x=Percentile
	pointradius=2
	spangaps=true
	xtype=linear
	xlabel = "Percentile"
	ylabel = "Response Time"

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: category
parameters.VALUE:
| source appdb
	query=`
	SELECT DISTINCT CATEGORY FROM CFW_EAV_ENTITY
	`
| sort CATEGORY
